title: Jaal
description: When a mysterious woman hires Shankar to spy on a family, he must determine how his own father's abandonment figures into the situation.
actors: Jeetendra, Mithun Chakraborty, Rekha, Mandakini

title: Jaane Tu... Ya Jaane Na
description: Soft-spoken Jai and spitfire beauty Aditi couldn't be more different -- but their family and friends know that they're a perfect match.
actors: Imran Khan, Genelia D'Souza, Manjari Fadnis, Ayaz Khan

title: Jab Harry Met Sejal
description: A philandering tour guide in Europe begins to develop feelings for one of his clients while helping her search for her lost engagement ring.
actors: Shah Rukh Khan, Anushka Sharma, Aru Krishansh Verma, Chandan Roy Sanyal

title: Jab We Met
description: Changing fortunes await a wealthy but dejected industrialist when he meets a spirited chatterbox on a train in this breezy Bollywood romantic comedy.
actors: Shahid Kapoor, Kareena Kapoor, Tarun Arora, Dara Singh

title: Jack and the Cuckoo-Clock Heart
description: Equipped with a mechanical heart and determined to stay out of death's shadow, young Jack understands that love could prove fatal.
actors: Orlando Seale, Samantha Barks, Harry Sadeghi, Stephane Cornicard

title: Jackass 2.5
description: Johnny Knoxville, Steve-O and the entire Jackass crew are back with even more inappropriate and reckless stunts, pranks and mischief.
actors: Johnny Knoxville, Steve-O, Bam Margera, Preston Lacy

title: Jackass: Number Two
description: Johnny Knoxville and his crew continue to shun dignity and embrace danger in this no-holds-barred sequel that keeps the gross-out factor high.
actors: Johnny Knoxville, Chris Pontius, Steve-O, Bam Margera

title: Jackpot
description: A lottery ticket salesperson faces an ethical dilemma after setting aside a soon-to-be winning ticket for a customer to pick up and pay for later.
actors: Chi Tai, Lan Ngoc, Dustin Nguyen, Thu Trang

title: Jafar Panahi's Taxi
description: Director Jafar Panahi poses as a taxi driver in Tehran and uses a dashboard-mounted camera to record interviews with a variety of passengers.
actors: Jafar Panahi

title: Jagga Jasoos
description: An eccentric, self-proclaimed detective goes on an action-packed hunt for his missing father, with an awkward but adventurous journalist by his side.
actors: Ranbir Kapoor, Katrina Kaif, Saurabh Shukla, Saswata Chatterjee

title: Jailbait
description: Relentlessly abused by her stepfather, Anna is ultimately driven to kill him and lands at a dangerously sadistic juvenile detention center.
actors: Sara Malakul Lane, Erin O'Brien, Steve Hanks, Andray Johnson

title: Jailbreak
description: Four cops escorting a mobster to a high-security prison fight for survival when a gang boss orchestrates a riot from outside to silence their charge.
actors: Jean-Paul Ly, Dara Our, Tharoth Sam, Dara Phang

title: Jake's Buccaneer Blast
description: Jake, Izzy, Cubby and Skully face off against the scheming Captain Hook in a race to find special treasures hidden all around Never Land.
actors: Megan Richie, Riley Thomas Stewart, Jadon Sand, David Arquette

title: Jal
description: A gifted young man from a drought-stricken village helps a group of ecologists find water for migrating flamingoes.
actors: Purab Kohli, Tannishtha Chatterjee, Kirti Kulhari, Yashpal Sharma

title: Jalpari: The Desert Mermaid
description: When they travel to their father's ancestral village, city kids expecting a natural paradise instead find a poor, dusty town that harbors secrets.
actors: Lehar Khan, Krishang Trivedi, Parvin Dabas, Suhasini Mulay

title: James
description: By saving a woman from being molested at the bar where he works, a bouncer runs afoul of a local mobster, who retaliates with swift and brutal action.
actors: Mohit Ahlawat, Priyanka Kothari, Zakir Hussain, Sherveer Vakil

title: James White
description: A self-destructive New Yorker attempts to transform himself when his reckless behavior prevents him from caring for his terminally ill mother.
actors: Christopher Abbott, Cynthia Nixon, Scott Mescudi, Ron Livingston

title: Janaan
description: After 11 years in Canada, young Meena returns to her native Pakistan for a family wedding and becomes romantically entangled with an adopted cousin.
actors: Armeena Rana Khan, Bilal Ashraf, Ali Rehman Khan, Hania Aamir

title: Jane & Payne
description: Capturing the long-planned meeting of primatologist Jane Goodall and whale conservationist Roger Payne, this film celebrates both scientists' careers.
actors: Jane Goodall, Roger Payne

title: Jarhead 3: The Siege
description: When insurgents assault a U.S. embassy, unsuspecting Marines guarding the compound are swept into a ferocious battle to protect civilian lives.
actors: Scott Adkins, Charlie Weber, Dante Basco, Romeo Miller

title: Jatt James Bond
description: Shinda loves Laali but can't have her, so he and his friends come up with an elaborate plan to solve all their problems and win her.
actors: Gippy Grewal, Gurpreet Guggi, Zarine Khan

title: Jatts in Golmaal
description: Without fully realizing the consequences, a boy who wants to relocate from India to Canada sells his heart to a gangster in need of a transplant.
actors: Arya Babbar, Samiksha Singh, Gurpreet Guggi, Binnu Dhillon

title: Je suis Charlie
description: This documentary takes a hard look at what led to the 2015 terrorist assault on French publication Charlie Hebdo, in which 12 were killed.

title: Jefe
description: A rude, self-centered businessman seems to be on the brink of losing everything until a night janitor at his office helps him find redemption.
actors: Luis Callejo, Juana Acosta, Carlo D'Ursi, Josean Bengoetxea

title: Jellies
description: Twelve different species of jellyfish swim across your screen for the ideal relaxation or ambient entertainment backdrop.

title: Jessica Darling's It List
description: Armed with popularity tips from her beautiful older sister, precocious Jessica Darling prepares to navigate the treacherous world of seventh grade.
actors: Chloe East, Emma Rayne Lyle, Jane Widdop, Jane Sibbett

title: Jet Li's Fearless
description: Jet Li stars as martial arts legend Huo Yuanjia, a Chinese fighter who dreams of continuing his father's legacy and restoring pride in his nation.
actors: Jet Li, Sun Li, Dong Yong, Shido Nakamura

title: Jewel's Catch One
description: The story of famed L.A. nightclub Catch One and owner Jewel Thais-Williams, who defied all odds and provided a safe space for black LGBT communities.
actors: Jewel Thais-Williams

title: Jihad: A Story of the Others
description: Seeking to understand what motivates jihadists in the West, Deeyah Khan speaks to Muslims who embraced -- and later renounced -- violent extremism.

title: Jodhaa Akbar
description: In 16th-century India, what begins as a strategic alliance between a Mughal emperor and a Hindu princess becomes a genuine opportunity for true love.
actors: Hrithik Roshan, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan, Sonu Sood, Suhasini Mulay

title: Joe Cocker: Mad Dog with Soul
description: From his star turn at Woodstock to his battles with addiction, this film chronicles the stormy life and unique talent of soulful singer Joe Cocker.

title: John & Jane
description: Truth and fiction blend in this quasi-documentary about six exhausted workers at a Mumbai call center servicing U.S. customers.

title: Joker
description: A remote village situated neither in India or Pakistan becomes its own republic after inmates at the local mental asylum bust loose and take over.
actors: Akshay Kumar, Sonakshi Sinha, Shreyas Talpade, Minissha Lamba

title: Jomonte Suviseshangal
description: A businessman's carefree, irresponsible son must change his ways to help his father recover from a crippling financial disaster.
actors: Dulquer Salmaan, Mukesh, Aishwarya Rajesh, Anupama Parameswaran

title: Jonas
description: During Carnival, two teens from different classes meet years after being kept apart. Bad decisions lead the boy to hide with the girl inside a float.
actors: Jesuíta Barbosa, Laura Neiva, Criolo, Ana Cecília Costa

title: Jora 10 Numbaria
description: The wounds of a traumatic childhood and a corrupt, unjust system push a young man into becoming a cold-blooded, ruthless gangster.
actors: Deep Sidhu, Dharmendra, Mukul Dev, Sardar Sohi

title: Joseph: King of Dreams
description: With his gift of dream interpretation and his brilliantly colored coat, Joseph inspires jealousy in his brothers in this animated Bible story.
actors: Ben Affleck, Mark Hamill, Richard Herd, Maureen McGovern

title: Journey to Greenland
description: When they flee Paris for a remote village in Greenland, two part-time actors become immersed in the archaic Inuit culture and forge unexpected bonds.
actors: Thomas Blanchard, Thomas Scimeca, François Chattot, Ole Eliassen

title: Journey to Le Mans
description: A British privateer team pushes itself to the limits of human endurance and engineering mastery to compete in the world's most challenging motor race.
actors: Patrick Stewart, Tiff Needell

title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: A hunch and the defunding of his laboratory prompt a geology professor to set off for Iceland in search of a portal to Earth's core.
actors: Brendan Fraser, Josh Hutcherson, Anita Briem, Seth Meyers

title: Judge Singh LLB
description: Framed by a politician for committing murder, a lower-class boy hires the only counsel he can afford: a lawyer with no courtroom experience.
actors: Ravinder Grewal, B.N. Sharma, Sardar Sohi, Chandan Prabhakar

title: Judwaa 2
description: Separated at birth, twins Raja and Prem couldn't be more different. But when fate puts them both in London, they start being mistaken for each other.
actors: Varun Dhawan, Jacqueline Fernandez, Tapsee Pannu, Rajpal Yadav

title: Julie & Julia
description: In this heartwarming tale, Julie Powell decides to spice up her uneventful life by cooking all 524 recipes outlined in Julia Child's classic cookbook.
actors: Meryl Streep, Amy Adams, Stanley Tucci, Chris Messina

title: Jurassic School
description: When his science fair project -- a cloned dinosaur egg -- hatches, Tommy becomes pals with the baby reptile ... until it escapes and he must find it!
actors: Gabriel Bennett, Amber Patino, Ashton Pulis, Jon Briddell

title: Just Another Love Story
description: When he causes a car accident that leaves a young woman with amnesia, a man finds himself telling incredible lies to make her and her family happy.
actors: Anders W. Berthelsen, Rebecka Hemse, Nikolaj Lie Kaas, Charlotte Fich

title: Justice, My Foot!
description: Slick lawyer Sung fears he's been cursed with bad karma and considers giving up his practice -- until he's approached by a widow accused of murder.
actors: Stephen Chow, Anita Mui, Carrie Ng, Wai Ai
